name: Taco Chicken
author: Don and Clara Essner Family
instructions: rumble Doritos chips and layer at the bottom of a 9 x 12 inch dish. Next layer is your deboned chicken. Mix together soups and Rotel tomatoes until they start boiling. Pour over the chicken layer. Cover dish with Saran Wrap and microwave for 25 minutes. Take off Saran Wrap and sprinkle cheese on top. Microwave until cheese is melted.
